    • Method Detail

      • delete

        public static final void delete(CalEvent event,
          Context context)
        "Deletes" the given event. The method for deletion in this application, is to change the start time of the event, to now, and the end time to one millisecond later
        Parameters:
        event - The given event
        context - The context of the application

      • getCalendarName

        public static final java.lang.String getCalendarName(Context context)
        The method to get the name of the calendar
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the app, used to extract the CONTENT_URI and the ContentResolver
        Returns:
        The name of the calendar

      • getPassword

        public static final java.lang.String getPassword(Context context)
        Used for retrieving the password from private file pwd
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the application
        Returns:
        The password needed to unlock the settings menu

      • isBefore

        public static final boolean isBefore(CalEvent event)
        Checks the end time of the given event is before the start time
        Parameters:
        event - The given event
        Returns:
        true, if the end is before the start

      • isFree

        public static final boolean isFree(CalEvent event)
        Checks whether or not the selected time will overlap with existing events
        Parameters:
        event - The selected time
        Returns:
        true, if it does not overlap

      • isUpdatable

        public static final boolean isUpdatable(CalEvent event,
                  int index)
        Checks whether or not there is free time to extend the end time of a selected event
        Parameters:
        event - The selected event
        index - The index of the selected event, so that it wont check with its own time
        Returns:
        true, if there is free time to extend

      • newPassword

        public static final java.lang.String newPassword(Context context)
        Used to generate a new default password
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the application
        Returns:
        The default password, if everything went well

      • readCalendar

        public static final java.util.ArrayList<CalEvent> readCalendar(Context context)
        The method that reads the calendar
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the app. Used to extract the CONTENT_URI and the ContentResolver
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of CalEvents, that either is started, or is in the future

      • readConfig

        public static final java.util.ArrayList<Setting> readConfig(Context context)
        Reads the config file, and then it interprets it
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the application
        Returns:
        A HashMap of (command, value) pairs

        Parameters:

          Context context)

        Parameters:

        context - The context of the application

      • updateEnd

        public static final void updateEnd(CalEvent event,
             Context context)
        Changes the end time of the given event, to the current time
        Parameters:
        event - The event that should be updated
        context - The context of the app, used to extract the CONTENT_URI and the ContentResolver

      • updateEnd

        public static final void updateEnd(CalEvent event,
             Context context,
             long time)
        Changes the end time of the given event, to the given time
        Parameters:
        event - The event that should be updated
        context - The context of the app, used to extract the CONTENT_URI and the ContentResolver
        time - The time the event should now end on

        context - The context of the app, used to extract the CONTENT_URI and the ContentResolver

      • updateStart

               Context context,
               long time)
        Changes the start time of the given event, to the given time
        Parameters:
        event - The event that should be updated
        context - The context of the application
        time - The time that the start should be set to
